name: GetBuildArtifact
description: Get the path of build Artifact
author: megoels
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: buildDefName
inputs.label: Build Definition Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the build definition to get Artifact from.

inputs.name: artifactPathVarName
inputs.label: Artifact Path Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The step returns to this variable path for the found Artifact (input name only without $).

inputs.name: buildArtifactName
inputs.label: Artifact Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of Artifact to get from the selected build. Keep it empty to get first Artifact.

inputs.name: latestSucceeded
inputs.label: Last Succeeded Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set true to get Artifact from last succeeded build

inputs.name: http_proxy
inputs.label: HTTP Proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the agent is behind Proxy and there's no environment variable then you can provide it here

inputs.name: https_proxy
inputs.label: HTTPS Proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the agent is behind Proxy and there's no environment variable then you can provide it here
